title: Wind Mills For Hope
description:
Hello!
 My name is William Kamkwamba and I am trying to build windmills for my village.
Ideally, we would like to build a residential windmill for each of our homes.
This comes out to about $10,000 USD per windmill at 15 homes for our village plus maintenance costs.

title: Business to Solar
description:
One of my lifelong goals has been convert my business to solar energy!
To do this, I'd like install a medium sized gridtie on top of my small business, which would cost around $25k before tax rebates
Thank you for your support! I really appreciate it
Investors will get return on investment through the money we save on energy costs

title: Electric Bus
description:
The City of Springfield is looking for investors to fund the addition of electric vehicles to its public transportation fleet
Please inquire below for further information about this investment opportunities or others
springfield@springfield.org

title: Geothermal Heat Pump for Crest Street
description: Our neighborhood wants to construct a geothermal heat pump. A lot of the residents in our neighborhood can not afford the rising cost of electricity. We hope the heat pump will make subsidize the cost of electricity for everyone.

title: Local Business Solar Panels
description:
Our business spends about a bit coin a year to maintain energy costs. We would like to invest in solar to replace 
our current energy. Extra money will be reinvested in the company and money will be paid back as our company grows.

title: Solar Farm
description:
Our community is trying to build a 500kW Solar Farm for our community.
 The farm will be used to power about 150 households in our local area.
